 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בֵּין‎</span> **preposition** ==between== (Biblical Hebrew [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בַּ֫יִן‎</span>,] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בֵּין‎</span>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בֵּין‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בֵּינֵי‎</span> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), [[Dan.7.5|Dan 7:5]] with suffix 3 plural masculine <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בֵּינֵיהוֺן‎</span> v[[Dan.7.7|Dan 7:7]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] 3 plural feminine <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בֵּינֵיהֵן‎</span>).
